features: Strong Structure, More Reliable - This tilting tv mount crafted by heavy gauge steel, ensure stronger stability than the ordinary structure TV rack. It supports a weight of up to 55lbs/25kilograms and has been thoroughly 4 times load-bearing test. Details of sturdy hook, safety lock and anti-drop raised edge prove our pursuit of precision quality and rigorously tested for absolute safety and performance for each TV wall mount.

Universal TV Compatibility - Our wall mount tv brackets fits well with SAMSUNG, SONY, LG, VIZIO, TCL, ELEMENT, SCEPTRE, HISENSE and other TV brands between 13 and 42 Inch screen sizes and up to 55 lbs, with max VESA/mounting holes spacing of 200*200mm, 200*100mm, 100*100mm, 100*200mm, 75*75mm, ideal for most tv mounting or monitors, please check your TV size, weight, VESA mount, stud location before purchase.

Simple, yet Chic Design - Freely tilt 10 degree down adjustment so you can choose the most comfortable position to upgrade your viewing experience while reducing glare and neck/eye strain. Places TV only 1” from the wall for a streamlined look that complements today’s sleek TVs., you can save enough space for a clean look and accommodate your house decor.

Easy Mount it in 30 Minutes - Every detail of the installation is perfect, free and flexible. Simple and intuitive design makes installation easy. All mounting hardware and instructions are included, just bring your tool and ready for mounting it ! You can choose to install your TV on a 8” wood stud or fix it with two sturdy bolts on a single stud, but avoid drywall alone.

Let it Mount Your Leisure Life - Use it as a monitor tv wall mount to clear up desktop space and for ergonomic computer screen installation to improve your posture and helps you get the best seat in the house and achieve the perfect TV viewing angle. This single stud wall mount is designed to the last and backed by reliable after-sale service, limited-lifetime replacement pledge and free technical support. Any questions please feel free to contact us at any time.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Inspired by the sleek and chic look of modern TVs, we add retro elements design to a brushed metal exterior. This wall mount TV bracket will blend seamlessly with every TVs and decor. The ultra-strong and solid steel frame provides enough secure and safety when keep your TV stay stably in place. With a lower profile than traditional full-motion tv mounts, PIST1 tilting tv mount well positions TV closer to the wall, providing unparalleled smoothness while create a more streamlined look.

WHY CHOOSE PIST1 Tilting TV Wall Mount? Our flat-panel TV wall mount can accommodate TVs ranging between 13" and 42", compatible with Samsung, Sony, LG, Sharp, Insignia, Vizio, Haier, Toshiba, Sharp, Element, TCL, Panasonic, Sceptre and leading brands. Wide compatibility of TV size means that you can mount most universal TVs or monitors. That only sits 1” closer to the wall totally achieve space-saving and clean look of home decor. Tilting tv wall mount with 10 degrees of downward tilting action to reduce glare from room lighting. Safety lock screw and sturdy hook on the wall plate holds your TV secure and stable on the wall. Simple, yet intuitive design easily blend your TV mounting with entire domestic outfit style. Clear-up Desk Space, mounting your monitor to the wall helps reduce clutter by clearing up valuable desk space for a more efficient workflow. Quick and easy to install, this flat tv mount bracket comes with all mounting kits, instructions and universal hardware.

How can I check if the mount is suitable for my TV/monitor? First, please check your wall for wood studs. You just only need a single stud to get it up on the wall or match this TV wall mount with 8” wood stud. Of course! It can be mounted on concrete wall and brick wall, but you need to use anchors when installing. Next, the weight of your TV/monitor should be less than 55lbs/25kg and your TV/monitor should be at least 13 inch. Then, please check the VESA pattern, VESA = horizontal × vertical. Mounting holes distance on the back of TV/monitor must be less than 8" (200mm) horizontally and 8" (200mm) vertically. Finally, please check the TV back area inside the 4 mounting holes to make sure there are not any cables outlet. Otherwise, the plate may block the plugs.

Specifications: Fits 13" to 42" flat panel TVs/monitors and supports TV/monitors weight up to 55lbs/25kg.Supports all major brands including Samsung, LG, Sony, TCL, Vizio, Philips, Sharp, Dell, Acer, Asus, HP, BenQ, Hisense, Panasonic, Toshiba and more.Fits VESA mounting hole patterns: 200x200mm/200x100mm/100x200mm/100x100mm/75x75mm ( In inches: 8"x8"/8"x4"/4"x8"/4"x4"/3"x3").Only 1” low profile from the wall allowing you to mount your TV almost flush with the wall to save space.10 degrees tilting adjustment make your TV flexibility and better view based on your seat in the room. Package includes:1x TV wall mount / 1x Standard mounting hardware / 1x User manual

At Pipishell, we set the strict standard for mount technology. Now we have been chosen by a wide range of American families, restaurant, bars, etc. Using innovative design and outstanding safety features, our mount is absolutely the right choice. PIST1 TV mount, as the new model tv mount in 2021, remained stable through the entire range of motion, offering the ability to mount your TV in a corner, exactly what you want during sports game, action-packed movies or just watching the latest episode of your favorite show. Perfect for kitchen, living room, back patio, educational purposes, classrooms, offices, conference rooms, presentations and more.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Tiny but mighty
reviews.reviewText: You’ll receive the box this mount comes in and assume it’s a joke, but don’t let it’s small size fool you. This is an easy to hang and adjust tv mount perfect for smaller TV’s. I’m impressed. Would purchase again!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 7, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This TV mount was very easy to put up, holds the TV nicely. I was impressed with the number of screws it provided, most of which you will not need, just find the correct ones for your TV, ignore the rest.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 17, 2023
reviews.reviewText: It works great. Easy to install. No issues at all.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Works as advertised
reviews.reviewText: I love the low profile and it was very easy to install, works as advertised.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Easy install and sturdy bracketry. Recommend

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2024
Reviewed in the United States on November 2, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I have a 32 inch TCL Roku TV. This mount is exactly what I needed. It fit the TV perfectly and was ridiculously easy to install. I was worried I’d have to spend at least $60 to get a good mount but for the quality and ease of this one it’s a steal!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Worked great for my 32 inch TV
reviews.reviewText: I used one in my office for a 32 inch TV and it worked out fine so I got another one for a 32 inch TV in a spare bedroom. Quality product with sufficient screws, bolts and other findings to support most TVs. Pay attention to weight limits, this mount seems a little light weight but still sturdy for my purposes.I'd buy it again... Oh, I did!
